blogPost.excerpt:
Boxing’s hottest attraction Gervonta “Tank” Davis defended his lightweight championship with a tough UD win over Isaac Cruz in an explosive showdown.

After his win, Davis spoke with Jim Gray about the tough fight, his injured left hand, and what comes next, including calling the rest of the division "easy work".

#SHOSports #GervontaDavis #TankDavis #IsaacCruz

Don't miss out on the action! Visit the below links to sign up for reminders!

blogPost.title: Gervonta Davis Calls Haney, Garcia, Kambosos 'Easy Work' & Says He Is The 'Top Dog' | SHOWTIME PPV
blogPost.author: SHOWTIME Sports

localize.title: Gervonta Davis、Haney、Garcia、Kambososを「イージーワーク」と称し、自分が「トップドッグ」であると語る｜SHOWTIME 日本版
格温塔-戴维斯称哈尼、加西亚、坎博索斯 "工作轻松"，并称自己是 "顶级狗"| SHOWTIME PPV
格溫塔-戴維斯稱哈尼、加西亞、坎博索斯 "工作輕鬆"，並稱自己是 "頂級狗"| SHOWTIME PPV

previous.excerpt:
Miles Morales’ story and the #SpiderVerse web expands. Take a first look at Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (Part One). Exclusively in movie theaters October 2022. 

Follow Us on Social:
https://www.facebook.com/SpiderVerseMovie
https://www.instagram.com/SpiderVerseMovie
https://www.twitter.com/SpiderVerse

Subscribe to Sony Pictures for exclusive content: http://bit.ly/SonyPicsSubscribe

Miles Morales returns for the next chapter of the Oscar®-winning Spider-Verse saga, an epic adventure that will transport Brooklyn’s full-time, friendly neighborhood Spider-Man across the Multiverse to join forces with Gwen Stacy and a new team of Spider-People to face off with a villain more powerful than anything they have ever encountered.
 
Spider-Man: Across the Spider-Verse (Part One) is coming exclusively to movie theaters on October 7, 2022.

Directed by:
Joaquim Dos Santos
Kemp Powers
Justin K. Thompson
 
Screenplay by: 
Phil Lord & Christopher Miller and David Callaham
 
Based on the MARVEL Comic Books
 
Produced by:
Avi Arad
Amy Pascal
Phil Lord
Christopher Miller
Christina Steinberg
 
Cast: 
Oscar Isaac
Shameik Moore
Hailee Steinfeld
 
#FirstLook #CCXPWorlds #CCXP  #Sony #SonyPictures #SpiderManAcrossTheSpiderVerse #AcrossTheSpiderVerse #SpiderMan #OscarIsaac #ShameikMoore #HaileeSteinfeld
